front.title: IEEE Guide for the Application of Surge Voltage Protective Equipment on Ac Rotating Machinery 1000 V and Greater Corrigendum 1: Replace Table 2, A.1, and A.2

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: AC rotating machines, coil insulation, generator insulation, groundwall insulation
impulse voltage, insulation strength, insulation withstand, motor insulation, surge arrester, surge voltage, surge withstand, turn insulation, winding insulation
front.abstract: This paper addresses the errors identified in IEEE Std C62.21-2003.
